attributes.action: launch a full public enquiry into the role of the treasury and the financial regulatory authorities, such as the FSA, in regulating and controlling the banking sector and financial markets in respect to the 'credit crunch' financial crisis, and the resultant impact on the economy, and the underlying banking and investment practices that caused it
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: CREDIT CRUNCH: What happened? How did it happen? Have the treasury and FSA been negligent? Who benefitted and who pays? How can we stop this occuring again? Do we need more and better regulation?
